task.title: How to Configure an XQJ Connection

taskbody.context: The steps for configuring an XQJ connection are the following:

step.cmd: Go to menu Preferences Data Sources .
Click the New button in the Connections panel.
Enter a unique name for this connection.
Select one of the previously configured XQJ data sources in the Data Source combo box.

step.info: The properties presented in the connection details table are automatically detected depending on the selected data source.
